name: LAError.Code
desc: Error codes that the framework returns when policy evaluation fails.

items.name: case appCancel
items.desc: The app canceled authentication.

items.name: case systemCancel
items.desc: The system canceled authentication.

items.name: case userCancel
items.desc: The user tapped the cancel button in the authentication dialog.

items.name: case biometryDisconnected
items.desc: The device supports biometry only using a removable accessory, but the paired accessory isn’t connected.

items.name: case biometryNotPaired
items.desc: The device supports biometry only using a removable accessory, but no accessory is paired.

items.name: static var biometryLockout: LAError.Code
items.desc: Biometry is locked because there were too many failed attempts.

items.name: static var biometryNotAvailable: LAError.Code
items.desc: Biometry is not available on the device.

items.name: static var biometryNotEnrolled: LAError.Code
items.desc: The user has no enrolled biometric identities.

items.name: case authenticationFailed
items.desc: The user failed to provide valid credentials.

items.name: case invalidContext
items.desc: The context was previously invalidated.

items.name: case notInteractive
items.desc: Displaying the required authentication user interface is forbidden.

items.name: case passcodeNotSet
items.desc: A passcode isn’t set on the device.

items.name: case userFallback
items.desc: The user tapped the fallback button in the authentication dialog, but no fallback is available for the authentication policy.

items.name: case watchNotAvailable
items.desc: An attempt to authenticate with Apple Watch failed.

items.name: var kLAErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The error domain used by LocalAuthentication.

items.name: var kLAErrorAppCancel: Int32
items.desc: The app canceled authentication.

items.name: var kLAErrorSystemCancel: Int32
items.desc: The system canceled authentication.

items.name: var kLAErrorUserCancel: Int32
items.desc: The user tapped the cancel button in the authentication dialog.

items.name: var kLAErrorBiometryDisconnected: Int32
items.desc: The device supports biometry only using a removable accessory, but the paired accessory isn’t connected.

items.name: var kLAErrorBiometryLockout: Int32
items.desc: Biometry is locked because there were too many failed attempts.

items.name: var kLAErrorBiometryNotAvailable: Int32
items.desc: Biometry is not available on the device.

items.name: var kLAErrorBiometryNotEnrolled: Int32
items.desc: The user has no enrolled biometric identities.

items.name: var kLAErrorBiometryNotPaired: Int32
items.desc: The device supports biometry only using a removable accessory, but no accessory is paired.

items.name: var kLAErrorTouchIDLockout: Int32
items.desc: Touch ID is locked because there were too many failed attempts.

items.name: var kLAErrorTouchIDNotAvailable: Int32
items.desc: Touch ID is not available on the device.

items.name: var kLAErrorTouchIDNotEnrolled: Int32
items.desc: The user has no enrolled Touch ID fingers.

items.name: var kLAErrorAuthenticationFailed: Int32
items.desc: The user failed to provide valid credentials.

items.name: var kLAErrorInvalidContext: Int32
items.desc: The context was previously invalidated.

items.name: var kLAErrorNotInteractive: Int32
items.desc: Displaying the required authentication user interface is forbidden.

items.name: var kLAErrorPasscodeNotSet: Int32
items.desc: A passcode isn’t set on the device.

items.name: var kLAErrorUserFallback: Int32
items.desc: The user tapped the fallback button in the authentication dialog, but no fallback is available for the authentication policy.

items.name: var kLAErrorWatchNotAvailable: Int32
items.desc: An attempt to authenticate with Apple Watch failed.
